page.title: 15A Day In My Life
page.content: My name is Claire Owens, I live in Pembrey and this is a typical Saturday in my life. My day begins when my mother wakes me at 7a.m I make my bed, brush my hair and go downstairs to have my breakfast. Usually my family are already there watching the morning breakfast programme on television. Later we go to Llanelli to shop.On the way home we often call in the Stepney Grill in Burry Port for coffee. After dinner my father goes to see a rugby match in Stradey.We go to Clyndu Riding School. My father takes us to the Swimming Pool in Llanelli in the evening, we are family members of the Club. The remainder of the evening is spent watching television or playing games on my computer. Then its time for a shower and bed. My father comes to say goodnight, the end of a happy day.
